functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrders
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple calls of fillOrder.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

functionDecorators.name: preSign
functionDecorators.description: Approves a hash on-chain using any valid signature type. After presigning a hash, the preSign signature type will become valid for that hash and signer.

parameterDecorators.name: signerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address that should have signed the given hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.

functionDecorators.name: matchOrders
functionDecorators.description: Match two complementary orders that have a profitable spread. Each order is filled at their respective price point. However, the calculations are carried out as though the orders are both being filled at the right order's price point. The profit made by the left order goes to the taker (who matched the two orders).

parameterDecorators.name: leftOrder
parameterDecorators.description: First order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: rightOrder
parameterDecorators.description: Second order to match.

parameterDecorators.name: leftSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the left maker.

parameterDecorators.name: rightSignature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order was created by the right maker.

functionDecorators.name: fillOrderNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Fills the input order. Returns false if the transaction would otherwise revert.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order has been created by maker.

functionDecorators.name: batchCancelOrders
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously cancels multiple orders in a single transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrKillOrders
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple calls of fillOrKill.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrdersUpTo
functionDecorators.description: Cancels all orders created by makerAddress with a salt less than or equal to the targetOrderEpoch and senderAddress equal to msg.sender (or null address if msg.sender == makerAddress).

parameterDecorators.name: targetOrderEpoch
parameterDecorators.description: Orders created with a salt less or equal to this value will be cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: batchFillOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Fills an order with specified parameters and ECDSA signature. Returns false if the transaction would otherwise revert.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmounts
parameterDecorators.description: Array of desired amounts of takerAsset to sell in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

functionDecorators.name: getAssetProxy
functionDecorators.description: Gets an asset proxy.

parameterDecorators.name: assetProxyId
parameterDecorators.description: Id of the asset proxy.

functionDecorators.name: fillOrKillOrder
functionDecorators.description: Fills the input order. Reverts if exact takerAssetFillAmount not filled.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order has been created by maker.

functionDecorators.name: setSignatureValidatorApproval
functionDecorators.description: Approves/unnapproves a Validator contract to verify signatures on signer's behalf.

parameterDecorators.name: validatorAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of Validator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: approval
parameterDecorators.description: Approval or disapproval of Validator contract.

functionDecorators.name: marketSellOrders
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple calls of fillOrder until total amount of takerAsset is sold by taker.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been created by makers.

functionDecorators.name: getOrdersInfo
functionDecorators.description: Fetches information for all passed in orders.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

functionDecorators.name: isValidSignature
functionDecorators.description: Verifies that a hash has been signed by the given signer.

parameterDecorators.name: hash
parameterDecorators.description: Any 32 byte hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address that should have signed the given hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that the hash has been signed by signer.

functionDecorators.name: marketBuyOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple fill orders in a single transaction until total amount is bought by taker. Returns false if the transaction would otherwise revert.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: makerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of makerAsset to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

functionDecorators.name: fillOrder
functionDecorators.description: Fills the input order.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order struct containing order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof that order has been created by maker.

functionDecorators.name: executeTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Executes an exchange method call in the context of signer.

parameterDecorators.name: salt
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrary number to ensure uniqueness of transaction hash.

parameterDecorators.name: signerAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of transaction signer.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: AbiV2 encoded calldata.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: Proof of signer transaction by signer.

functionDecorators.name: registerAssetProxy
functionDecorators.description: Registers an asset proxy to its asset proxy id. Once an asset proxy is registered, it cannot be unregistered.

parameterDecorators.name: assetProxy
parameterDecorators.description: Address of new asset proxy to register.

functionDecorators.name: getOrderInfo
functionDecorators.description: Gets information about an order: status, hash, and amount filled.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order to gather information on.

functionDecorators.name: cancelOrder
functionDecorators.description: After calling, the order can not be filled anymore. Throws if order is invalid or sender does not have permission to cancel.

parameterDecorators.name: order
parameterDecorators.description: Order to cancel. Order must be OrderStatus.FILLABLE.

functionDecorators.name: marketSellOrdersNoThrow
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple calls of fillOrder until total amount of takerAsset is sold by taker. Returns false if the transaction would otherwise revert.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: takerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of takerAsset to sell.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.

functionDecorators.name: marketBuyOrders
functionDecorators.description: Synchronously executes multiple calls of fillOrder until total amount of makerAsset is bought by taker.

parameterDecorators.name: orders
parameterDecorators.description: Array of order specifications.

parameterDecorators.name: makerAssetFillAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Desired amount of makerAsset to buy.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Proofs that orders have been signed by makers.
